original_text: And there fell of Benjamin eighteen thousand men; all these were men of valour.
korean_text: 베냐민 중에서 엎드러진 자가 만 팔천 명이니 다 용사더라

sentences.original_text: And there fell of Benjamin eighteen thousand men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 베냐민 지파에서 일만 팔천 명의 사람들이 죽었다

sentences.original_text: all these were men of valour
